title: The Mists of Avalon (based on the book by Marion Zimmer Bradley)
description: Incredible movie based on the incredible book. It&#039;s VERY true to the original book and is almost perfect. Any King Arthur/Camelot fan or Marion Zimmer Bradley fan, or even someone who generally doesn&#039;t like fantasy, will enjoy this. I did not originally upload this torrent, it was uploaded by someone else and has very few seeders since the original upload at a popular site that is now closed (we all know which one, I&#039;m sure) and it&#039;s the only place I know of that has a torrent of this. I had to share! I&#039;ve kept this on my computer for at least a year and a half now, that&#039;s how great this movie is. It&#039;s in two parts, each about an hour and a half long, and is fairly good quality. Not sure if it&#039;s a DVD rip or what, though. My share ratio on this is over 100, so I&#039;ve been seeding it for quite a while :) Enjoy.
